medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patients presented with hypogonadism at varying ages, with some noting never having gone through pubertal development. Duration of symptoms was lifelong until referral for treatment. The severity of symptoms varied, with some showing signs like small testes, micropenis, or primary amenorrhea.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Consanguinity in parents; three patients had mutations in TAC3 and TACR3 related to congenital hypogonadotropic hypogonadism (CHH).
medical_history.family_history: Family history of consanguinity; all patients from consanguineous families with affected siblings.
